message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/MasterRD08-09 

Here we include information for the students of the "Master de Investigación en Inteligencia Artificial".
Student list
For privacy reasons, this is only accessible by the lecturers
Deadline for final assignment: 26/06/2009
Objectives

[
Descripción
]
All lectures, except for the introductory one, will follow this structure:
Presentation (90 minutes)
Discussion about work done during the week (e.g., papers that have been read, assignment that has been carried out) (25 minutes)
Description of work to be done for the following week (5 minutes)
Evaluation will be done on the basis of: participation in discussions (20%), periodical assignments (50%) and final assignment (30%)
Schedule and Material
speaker: SYSTEM
